languages.text: Лорд-капитан решил{mf||а} не рисковать людьми и приказал{mf||а} отряду Вести отступить.
The Lord Captain decided not to risk {mf|his|her} people and ordered Vesti's unit to withdraw.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан решил{mf||а} не рисковать людьми и приказал{mf||а} отряду Вести отступить.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain decided not to risk {mf|his|her} people and ordered Vesti's unit to withdraw.
The Lord Captain decided not to risk {mf|his|her} people and ordered Vesti's unit to withdraw.
The Lord Captain decided not to risk {mf|his|her} people and ordered Vesti's unit to withdraw.
The Lord Captain decided not to risk {mf|his|her} people and ordered Vesti's unit to withdraw.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} decidió no arriesgar a su gente y ordenó a la unidad de Vesti que se retirara.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain decided not to risk {mf|his|her} people and ordered Vesti's unit to withdraw.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} decidió no arriesgar a su gente y ordenó a la unidad de Vesti que se retirara.

languages.text: 舰长大人决定不让{mf|他|她}的士兵冒生命危险，命令维斯提的部队撤退。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain decided not to risk {mf|his|her} people and ordered Vesti's unit to withdraw.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人决定不让{mf|他|她}的士兵冒生命危险，命令维斯提的部队撤退。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは仲間を危険にさらさないと決め、ヴェスティの部隊に撤退を命じた。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain decided not to risk {mf|his|her} people and ordered Vesti's unit to withdraw.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは仲間を危険にさらさないと決め、ヴェスティの部隊に撤退を命じた。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain beschloss, das Leben {mf|seiner|ihrer} Leute nicht aufs Spiel zu setzen, und befahl Vestis Einheit den Rückzug.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain decided not to risk {mf|his|her} people and ordered Vesti's unit to withdraw.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain beschloss, das Leben {mf|seiner|ihrer} Leute nicht aufs Spiel zu setzen, und befahl Vestis Einheit den Rückzug.

languages.text: {name} ordonna à l'unité de Vesti de se replier, préférant ne pas risquer la vie de ses hommes.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain decided not to risk {mf|his|her} people and ordered Vesti's unit to withdraw.

traits.locale_text: {name} ordonna à l'unité de Vesti de se replier, préférant ne pas risquer la vie de ses hommes.

languages.text: Mürettebatını riske atmak istemeyen Lord Kaptan, Vesti'nin biriminin çekilmesini buyurdu.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain decided not to risk {mf|his|her} people and ordered Vesti's unit to withdraw.

traits.locale_text: Mürettebatını riske atmak istemeyen Lord Kaptan, Vesti'nin biriminin çekilmesini buyurdu.
